ps1.4:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
ps1.4:3.14_0: imehi pannarasahi ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni visujjhanti.
ps1.4:4.1_0: Katihākārehi pañcindriyāni bhāviyanti, katihākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ bhāvanā hoti?
ps1.4:4.2_0: Dasahākārehi pañcindriyāni bhāviyanti, dasahākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ bhāvanā hoti.
ps1.4:4.3_0: Assaddhiyaṁ pajahanto saddhindriyaṁ bhāveti, saddhindriyaṁ bhāvento assaddhiyaṁ pajahati;
ps1.4:4.4_0: kosajjaṁ pajahanto vīriyindriyaṁ bhāveti, vīriyindriyaṁ bhāvento kosajjaṁ pajahati;
ps1.4:4.5_0: pamādaṁ pajahanto satindriyaṁ bhāveti, satindriyaṁ bhāvento pamādaṁ pajahati;
ps1.4:4.6_0: uddhaccaṁ pajahanto samādhindriyaṁ bhāveti, samādhindriyaṁ bhāvento uddhaccaṁ pajahati;
ps1.4:4.7_0: avijjaṁ pajahanto paññindriyaṁ bhāveti, paññindriyaṁ bhāvento avijjaṁ pajahati.
ps1.4:4.8_0: Imehi dasahākārehi pañcindriyāni bhāviyanti, imehi dasahākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ bhāvanā hoti.
ps1.4:5.3_0: Assaddhiyassa pahīnattā suppahīnattā saddhindriyaṁ bhāvitaṁ hoti subhāvitaṁ;
ps1.4:5.4_0: saddhindriyassa bhāvitattā subhāvitattā assaddhiyaṁ pahīnaṁ hoti suppahīnaṁ.
ps1.4:5.5_0: Kosajjassa pahīnattā suppahīnattā vīriyindriyaṁ bhāvitaṁ hoti subhāvitaṁ;
ps1.4:5.6_0: vīriyindriyassa bhāvitattā subhāvitattā kosajjaṁ pahīnaṁ hoti suppahīnaṁ.
ps1.4:5.7_0: Pamādassa pahīnattā suppahīnattā satindriyaṁ bhāvitaṁ hoti subhāvitaṁ;
ps1.4:5.8_0: satindriyassa bhāvitattā subhāvitattā pamādo pahīno hoti suppahīno.
ps1.4:5.9_0: Uddhaccassa pahīnattā suppahīnattā samādhindriyaṁ bhāvitaṁ hoti subhāvitaṁ;
ps1.4:5.10_0: samādhindriyassa bhāvitattā subhāvitattā uddhaccaṁ pahīnaṁ hoti suppahīnaṁ.
ps1.4:5.11_0: Avijjāya pahīnattā paññindriyaṁ bhāvitaṁ hoti subhāvitaṁ;
ps1.4:5.12_0: paññindriyassa bhāvitattā subhāvitattā avijjā pahīnā hoti suppahīnā.
ps1.4:5.13_0: Imehi dasahākārehi pañcindriyāni bhāvitāni honti subhāvitāni.
ps1.4:6.1_1: katihākārehi pañcindriyāni bhāvitāni ceva honti subhāvitāni ca paṭippassaddhāni ca suppaṭippassaddhāni ca?
ps1.4:6.2_0: Catūhākārehi pañcindriyāni bhāviyanti catūhākārehi pañcindriyāni bhāvitāni ceva honti subhāvitāni ca paṭippassaddhāni ca suppaṭippassaddhāni ca.
ps1.4:6.4_0: sotāpattiphalakkhaṇe pañcindriyāni bhāvitāni ceva honti subhāvitāni ca paṭippassaddhāni ca suppaṭippassaddhāni ca.
ps1.4:6.6_0: sakadāgāmiphalakkhaṇe pañcindriyāni bhāvitāni ceva honti subhāvitāni ca paṭippassaddhāni ca suppaṭippassaddhāni ca.
ps1.4:6.8_0: anāgāmiphalakkhaṇe pañcindriyāni bhāvitāni ceva honti subhāvitāni ca paṭippassaddhāni ca suppaṭippassaddhāni ca.
ps1.4:6.10_0: arahattaphalakkhaṇe pañcindriyāni bhāvitāni ceva honti subhāvitāni ca paṭippassaddhāni ca suppaṭippassaddhāni ca.
ps1.4:6.13_0: imehi catūhākārehi pañcindriyāni bhāvitāni ceva honti subhāvitāni ca paṭippassaddhāni ca suppaṭippassaddhāni ca.
ps1.4:7.9_0: Savanena buddho tathāgatassa sāvako khīṇāsavo bhāvitindriyo,
ps1.4:9.1_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā imesaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānanti, na me te,
ps1.4:9.1_4: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu vā samaṇasammatā,
ps1.4:9.2_0: na ca panete āyasmantā sāmaññatthaṁ vā brahmaññatthaṁ vā diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharanti.
ps1.4:10.1_0: Ye ca kho keci bhikkhave samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā imesaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca
ps1.4:10.1_4: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu vā samaṇasammatā,
ps1.4:10.2_0: te ca panāyasmantā sāmaññatthañca brahmaññatthañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī”ti.
ps1.4:11.5_0: Katihākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ assādo hoti, katihākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ assādaṁ pajānāti?
ps1.4:12.1_0: Cattārīsāya ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ samudayo hoti;
ps1.4:12.2_0: cattārīsāya ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ samudayaṁ pajānāti.
ps1.4:12.3_0: Cattārīsāya ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ atthaṅgamo hoti;
ps1.4:12.4_0: cattārīsāya ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ atthaṅgamaṁ pajānāti.
ps1.4:12.5_0: Pañcavīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ assādo hoti;
ps1.4:12.6_0: pañcavīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ assādaṁ pajānāti.
ps1.4:12.7_0: Pañcavīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ ādīnavo hoti;
ps1.4:12.8_0: pañcavīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ ādīnavaṁ pajānāti.
ps1.4:12.9_0: Asītisataṁ ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ nissaraṇaṁ hoti;
ps1.4:12.10_0: asītisataṁ ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ nissaraṇaṁ pajānāti.
ps1.4:13.1_0: Katamehi cattārīsāya ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ samudayo hoti;
ps1.4:13.2_0: katamehi cattārīsāya ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ samudayaṁ pajānāti?
ps1.4:13.3_0: Adhimokkhatthāya āvajjanāya samudayo saddhindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.3_1: adhimokkhavasena chandassa samudayo saddhindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.3_2: adhimokkhavasena manasikārassa samudayo saddhindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.3_3: saddhindriyassa vasena ekattupaṭṭhānaṁ saddhindriyassa samudayo hoti;
ps1.4:13.4_0: paggahatthāya āvajjanāya samudayo vīriyindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.4_1: paggahavasena chandassa samudayo vīriyindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.4_2: paggahavasena manasikārassa samudayo vīriyindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.4_3: vīriyindriyassa vasena ekattupaṭṭhānaṁ vīriyindriyassa samudayo hoti;
ps1.4:13.5_0: upaṭṭhānatthāya āvajjanāya samudayo satindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.5_1: upaṭṭhānavasena chandassa samudayo satindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.5_2: upaṭṭhānavasena manasikārassa samudayo satindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.5_3: satindriyassa vasena ekattupaṭṭhānaṁ satindriyassa samudayo hoti;
ps1.4:13.6_0: avikkhepatthāya āvajjanāya samudayo samādhindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.6_1: avikkhepavasena chandassa samudayo samādhindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.6_2: avikkhepavasena manasikārassa samudayo samādhindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.6_3: samādhindriyassa vasena ekattupaṭṭhānaṁ samādhindriyassa samudayo hoti;
ps1.4:13.7_0: dassanatthāya āvajjanāya samudayo paññindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.7_1: dassanavasena chandassa samudayo paññindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.7_2: dassanavasena manasikārassa samudayo paññindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.7_3: paññindriyassa vasena ekattupaṭṭhānaṁ paññindriyassa samudayo hoti.
ps1.4:13.8_0: Adhimokkhatthāya āvajjanāya samudayo saddhindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.8_1: paggahatthāya āvajjanāya samudayo vīriyindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.8_2: upaṭṭhānatthāya āvajjanāya samudayo satindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.8_3: avikkhepatthāya āvajjanāya samudayo samādhindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.8_4: dassanatthāya āvajjanāya samudayo paññindriyassa samudayo hoti.
ps1.4:13.9_0: Adhimokkhavasena chandassa samudayo saddhindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.9_1: paggahavasena chandassa samudayo vīriyindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.9_2: upaṭṭhānavasena chandassa samudayo satindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.9_3: avikkhepavasena chandassa samudayo samādhindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.9_4: dassanavasena chandassa samudayo paññindriyassa samudayo hoti.
ps1.4:13.10_0: Adhimokkhavasena manasikārassa samudayo saddhindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.10_1: paggahavasena manasikārassa samudayo vīriyindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.10_2: upaṭṭhānavasena manasikārassa samudayo satindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.10_3: avikkhepavasena manasikārassa samudayo samādhindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.10_4: dassanavasena manasikārassa samudayo paññindriyassa samudayo hoti.
ps1.4:13.11_0: Saddhindriyassa vasena ekattupaṭṭhānaṁ saddhindriyassa samudayo hoti vīriyindriyassa vasena ekattupaṭṭhānaṁ vīriyindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.11_1: satindriyassa vasena ekattupaṭṭhānaṁ satindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.11_2: samādhindriyassa vasena ekattupaṭṭhānaṁ samādhindriyassa samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:13.11_3: paññindriyassa vasena ekattupaṭṭhānaṁ paññindriyassa samudayo hoti.
ps1.4:14.1_0: Imehi cattārīsāya ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ samudayo hoti,
ps1.4:14.1_1: imehi cattārīsāya ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ samudayaṁ pajānāti.
ps1.4:15.1_0: Katamehi cattārīsāya ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ atthaṅgamo hoti;
ps1.4:15.2_0: katamehi cattārīsāya ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ atthaṅgamaṁ pajānāti?
ps1.4:15.3_0: Adhimokkhatthāya āvajjanāya atthaṅgamo saddhindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:15.3_1: adhimokkhavasena chandassa atthaṅgamo saddhindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:15.3_2: adhimokkhavasena manasikārassa atthaṅgamo saddhindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:15.3_3: saddhindriyassa vasena ekattaanupaṭṭhānaṁ saddhindriyassa vasena atthaṅgamo hoti;
ps1.4:15.4_0: paggahatthāya āvajjanāya atthaṅgamo vīriyindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:15.4_1: paggahavasena chandassa atthaṅgamo vīriyindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:15.4_2: paggahavasena manasikārassa atthaṅgamo vīriyindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:15.4_3: vīriyindriyassa vasena ekattaanupaṭṭhānaṁ vīriyindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti;
ps1.4:15.5_0: upaṭṭhānatthāya āvajjanāya atthaṅgamo satindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:15.5_1: upaṭṭhānavasena chandassa atthaṅgamo satindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:15.5_2: upaṭṭhānavasena manasikārassa atthaṅgamo satindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:15.5_3: satindriyassa vasena ekattaanupaṭṭhānaṁ satindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti;
ps1.4:15.6_0: avikkhepatthāya āvajjanāya atthaṅgamo samādhindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:15.6_1: avikkhepavasena chandassa atthaṅgamo samādhindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:15.6_2: avikkhepavasena manasikārassa atthaṅgamo samādhindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:15.6_3: samādhindriyassa vasena ekattaanupaṭṭhānaṁ samādhindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti;
ps1.4:15.7_0: dassanatthāya āvajjanāya atthaṅgamo paññindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:15.7_1: dassanavasena chandassa atthaṅgamo paññindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:15.7_2: dassanavasena manasikārassa atthaṅgamo paññindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:15.7_3: paññindriyassa vasena ekattaanupaṭṭhānaṁ paññindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti.
ps1.4:16.1_0: Adhimokkhatthāya āvajjanāya atthaṅgamo saddhindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:16.1_1: paggahatthāya āvajjanāya atthaṅgamo vīriyindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:16.1_2: upaṭṭhānatthāya āvajjanāya atthaṅgamo satindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:16.1_3: avikkhepatthāya āvajjanāya atthaṅgamo samādhindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:16.1_4: dassanatthāya āvajjanāya atthaṅgamo paññindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti.
ps1.4:16.2_0: Adhimokkhavasena chandassa atthaṅgamo saddhindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:16.2_1: paggahavasena chandassa atthaṅgamo vīriyindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:16.2_2: upaṭṭhānavasena chandassa atthaṅgamo satindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:16.2_3: avikkhepavasena chandassa atthaṅgamo samādhindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:16.2_4: dassanavasena chandassa atthaṅgamo paññindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti.
ps1.4:16.3_0: Adhimokkhavasena manasikārassa atthaṅgamo saddhindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:16.3_1: paggahavasena manasikārassa atthaṅgamo vīriyindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:16.3_2: upaṭṭhānavasena manasikārassa atthaṅgamo satindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:16.3_3: avikkhepavasena manasikārassa atthaṅgamo samādhindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:16.3_4: dassanavasena manasikārassa atthaṅgamo paññindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti.
ps1.4:16.4_0: Saddhindriyassa vasena ekattaanupaṭṭhānaṁ saddhindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:16.4_1: vīriyindriyassa vasena ekattaanupaṭṭhānaṁ vīriyindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:16.4_2: satindriyassa vasena ekattaanupaṭṭhānaṁ satindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:16.4_3: samādhindriyassa vasena ekattaanupaṭṭhānaṁ samādhindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti,
ps1.4:16.4_4: paññindriyassa vasena ekattaanupaṭṭhānaṁ paññindriyassa atthaṅgamo hoti.
ps1.4:17.1_0: Imehi cattārīsāya ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ atthaṅgamo hoti;
ps1.4:17.2_0: imehi cattārīsāya ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ atthaṅgamaṁ pajānāti.
ps1.4:18.1_0: Katamehi pañcavīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ assādo hoti;
ps1.4:18.2_0: katamehi pañcavīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ assādaṁ pajānāti?
ps1.4:18.3_3: santo ca vihārādhigamo saddhindriyassa assādo hoti,
ps1.4:18.3_4: yaṁ saddhindriyaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ ayaṁ saddhindriyassa assādo.
ps1.4:19.1_3: santo ca vihārādhigamo vīriyindriyassa assādo hoti,
ps1.4:19.1_4: yaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ ayaṁ vīriyindriyassa assādo.
ps1.4:20.1_3: santo ca vihārādhigamo satindriyassa assādo hoti,
ps1.4:20.1_4: yaṁ satindriyaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ ayaṁ satindriyassa assādo.
ps1.4:21.1_3: santo ca vihārādhigamo samādhindriyassa assādo hoti,
ps1.4:21.1_4: yaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ ayaṁ samādhindriyassa assādo.
ps1.4:22.1_3: santo ca vihārādhigamo paññindriyassa assādo hoti,
ps1.4:22.1_4: yaṁ paññindriyaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ ayaṁ paññindriyassa assādo.
ps1.4:23.1_0: Imehi pañcavīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ assādo hoti;
ps1.4:23.2_0: imehi pañcavīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ assādaṁ pajānāti.
ps1.4:24.1_0: Katamehi pañcavīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ ādīnavo hoti;
ps1.4:24.2_0: katamehi pañcavīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ ādīnavaṁ pajānāti?
ps1.4:29.1_0: Imehi pañcavīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ ādīnavo hoti;
ps1.4:29.2_0: imehi pañcavīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ ādīnavaṁ pajānāti.
ps1.4:30.1_0: Katamehi asītisataṁ ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ nissaraṇaṁ hoti;
ps1.4:30.2_0: katamehi asītisataṁ ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ nissaraṇaṁ pajānāti?
ps1.4:31.1_2: tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca nissaṭaṁ hoti,
ps1.4:31.1_4: tato paṇītatarasaddhindriyassa paṭilābhā purimatarasaddhindriyā nissaṭaṁ hoti.
ps1.4:32.1_2: tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca nissaṭaṁ hoti,
ps1.4:32.1_4: tato paṇītataravīriyindriyassa paṭilābhā purimataravīriyindriyā nissaṭaṁ hoti.
ps1.4:33.1_2: tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca nissaṭaṁ hoti,
ps1.4:33.1_4: tato paṇītatarasatindriyassa paṭilābhā purimatarasatindriyā nissaṭaṁ hoti.
ps1.4:34.1_2: tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca nissaṭaṁ hoti,
ps1.4:34.1_4: tato paṇītatarasamādhindriyassa paṭilābhā purimatarasamādhindriyā nissaṭaṁ hoti.
ps1.4:35.1_2: tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca nissaṭaṁ hoti,
ps1.4:35.1_4: tato paṇītatarapaññindriyassa paṭilābhā purimatarapaññindriyā nissaṭaṁ hoti.
ps1.4:36.1_0: Pubbabhāge pañcahi indriyehi paṭhamajjhānavasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:36.1_1: paṭhame jhāne pañcahindriyehi dutiyajjhānavasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:36.1_2: dutiye jhāne pañcahindriyehi tatiyajjhānavasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:36.1_3: tatiye jhāne pañcahindriyehi catutthajjhānavasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:36.1_4: catutthe jhāne pañcahindriyehi ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattivasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:36.1_5: ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā pañcahindriyehi viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattivasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:36.1_6: viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattiyā pañcahindriyehi ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattivasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:36.1_7: ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiyā pañcahindriyehi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattivasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti.
ps1.4:37.1_0: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā pañcahindriyehi aniccānupassanāvasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:37.1_1: aniccānupassanāya pañcahindriyehi dukkhānupassanāvasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:37.1_2: dukkhānupassanāya pañcahindriyehi anattānupassanāvasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:37.1_3: anattānupassanāya pañcahindriyehi nibbidānupassanāvasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:37.1_4: nibbidānupassanāya pañcahindriyehi virāgānupassanāvasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:37.1_5: virāgānupassanāya pañcahindriyehi nirodhānupassanāvasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:37.1_6: nirodhānupassanāya pañcahindriyehi paṭinissaggānupassanāvasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:37.1_7: paṭinissaggānupassanāya pañcahindriyehi khayānupassanāvasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:37.1_8: khayānupassanāya pañcahindriyehi vayānupassanāvasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:37.1_9: vayānupassanāya pañcahindriyehi vipariṇāmānupassanāvasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:37.1_10: vipariṇāmānupassanāya pañcahindriyehi animittānupassanāvasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:37.1_11: animittānupassanāya pañcahindriyehi appaṇihitānupassanāvasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:37.1_12: appaṇihitānupassanāya pañcahindriyehi suññatānupassanāvasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti suññatānupassanāya
ps1.4:37.2_0: Adhipaññādhammavipassanāya pañcahindriyehi yathābhūtañāṇadassanavasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:37.2_1: yathābhūtañāṇadassane pañcahindriyehi ādīnavānupassanāvasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:37.2_2: ādīnavānupassanāya pañcahindriyehi paṭisaṅkhānupassanāvasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:37.2_3: paṭisaṅkhānupassanāya pañcahindriyehi vivaṭṭanānupassanāvasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti.
ps1.4:38.1_0: Vivaṭṭanānupassanāya pañcahindriyehi sotāpattimaggavasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:38.1_1: sotāpattimagge pañcahindriyehi sotāpattiphalasamāpattivasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:38.1_2: sotāpattiphalasamāpattiyā pañcahindriyehi sakadāgāmimaggavasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:38.1_3: sakadāgāmimagge pañcahindriyehi sakadāgāmiphalasamāpattivasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:38.1_4: sakadāgāmiphalasamāpattiyā pañcahindriyehi anāgāmimaggavasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:38.1_5: anāgāmimagge pañcahindriyehi anāgāmiphalasamāpattivasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:38.1_6: anāgāmiphalasamāpattiyā pañcahindriyehi arahattamaggavasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:38.1_7: arahattamagge pañcahindriyehi arahattaphalasamāpattivasena pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni honti.
ps1.4:40.1_0: Paṭhame jhāne pañcindriyāni nīvaraṇehi nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:40.1_1: dutiye jhāne pañcindriyāni vitakkavicārehi nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:40.1_2: tatiye jhāne pañcindriyāni pītiyā nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:40.1_3: catutthe jhāne pañcindriyāni sukhadukkhehi nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:40.1_4: ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā pañcindriyāni rūpasaññāya paṭighasaññāya nānattasaññāya nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:42.1_0: Sotāpattimagge pañcindriyāni diṭṭhekaṭṭhehi kilesehi nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:42.1_1: sakadāgāmimagge pañcindriyāni oḷārikehi kilesehi nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:42.1_2: anāgāmimagge pañcindriyāni anusahagatehi kilesehi nissaṭāni honti,
ps1.4:42.1_4: sabbesaññeva khīṇāsavānaṁ tattha tattha pañcindriyāni nissaṭāni ceva honti sunissaṭāni ca paṭippassaddhāni ca suppaṭippassaddhāni ca.
ps1.4:43.1_0: Imehi asītisataṁ ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ nissaraṇaṁ hoti;
ps1.4:43.2_0: imehi asītisataṁ ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ nissaraṇaṁ pajānāti.
ps1.4:45.1_0: Catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu saddhindriyassa vasena katihākārehi pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni?
ps1.4:45.2_0: Catūsu sammappadhānesu vīriyindriyassa vasena katihākārehi pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni?
ps1.4:45.3_0: Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu satindriyassa vasena katihākārehi pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni?
ps1.4:45.4_0: Catūsu jhānesu samādhindriyassa vasena katihākārehi pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni?
ps1.4:45.5_0: Catūsu ariyasaccesu paññindriyassa vasena katihākārehi pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni?
ps1.4:46.1_0: Catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu saddhindriyassa vasena vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni.
ps1.4:46.2_0: Catūsu sammappadhānesu vīriyindriyassa vasena vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni.
ps1.4:46.3_0: Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu satindriyassa vasena vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni.
ps1.4:46.4_0: Catūsu jhānesu samādhindriyassa vasena vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni.
ps1.4:46.5_0: Catūsu ariyasaccesu paññindriyassa vasena vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni.
ps1.4:47.1_0: Catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu saddhindriyassa vasena katamehi vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni?
ps1.4:47.6_0: Catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu saddhindriyassa vasena imehi vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni.
ps1.4:48.1_0: Catūsu sammappadhānesu vīriyindriyassa vasena katamehi vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni?
ps1.4:48.2_0: Anuppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ anuppādāya sammappadhāne paggahādhipateyyaṭṭhena vīriyindriyaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ,
ps1.4:48.3_0: Uppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya sammappadhāne …pe…
ps1.4:48.5_0: uppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā sammappadhāne
ps1.4:48.6_0: Catūsu sammappadhānesu vīriyindriyassa vasena imehi vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni.
ps1.4:49.1_0: Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu satindriyassa vasena katamehi vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni?
ps1.4:49.6_0: Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu satindriyassa vasena imehi vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni.
ps1.4:50.1_0: Catūsu jhānesu samādhindriyassa vasena katamehi vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni?
ps1.4:50.6_0: Catūsu jhānesu samādhindriyassa vasena imehi vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni.
ps1.4:51.1_0: Catūsu ariyasaccesu paññindriyassa vasena katamehi vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni?
ps1.4:51.5_0: dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ariyasacce dassanādhipateyyaṭṭhena paññindriyaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ,
ps1.4:51.6_0: Catūsu ariyasaccesu paññindriyassa vasena imehi vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcindriyāni daṭṭhabbāni.
ps1.4:52.1_0: Catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu saddhindriyassa vasena katihākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ cariyā daṭṭhabbā?
ps1.4:53.4_0: catūsu ariyasaccesu paññindriyassa vasena katihākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ cariyā daṭṭhabbā?
ps1.4:53.5_0: Catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu saddhindriyassa vasena vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ cariyā daṭṭhabbā.
ps1.4:53.9_0: catūsu ariyasaccesu paññindriyassa vasena vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ cariyā daṭṭhabbā.
ps1.4:54.1_0: Catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu saddhindriyassa vasena katamehi vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ cariyā daṭṭhabbā?
ps1.4:54.2_0: Sappurisasaṁseve sotāpattiyaṅge adhimokkhādhipateyyaṭṭhena saddhindriyassa cariyā daṭṭhabbā,
ps1.4:54.2_1: saddhindriyassa vasena paggahaṭṭhena vīriyindriyassa cariyā daṭṭhabbā,
ps1.4:54.5_0: dhammānudhammapaṭipattiyā sotāpattiyaṅge adhimokkhādhipateyyaṭṭhena saddhindriyassa cariyā daṭṭhabbā,
ps1.4:54.5_1: saddhindriyassa vasena paggahaṭṭhena vīriyindriyassa cariyā daṭṭhabbā,
ps1.4:54.6_0: Catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu saddhindriyassa vasena imehi vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ cariyā daṭṭhabbā.
ps1.4:55.1_0: Catūsu sammappadhānesu vīriyindriyassa vasena katamehi vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ cariyā daṭṭhabbā?
ps1.4:55.2_0: Anuppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ anuppādāya sammappadhāne paggahādhipateyyaṭṭhena vīriyindriyassa cariyā daṭṭhabbā,
ps1.4:55.2_1: vīriyindriyassa vasena upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena satindriyassa cariyā daṭṭhabbā,
ps1.4:55.3_0: Uppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya sammappadhāne …pe…
ps1.4:55.5_0: uppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā sammappadhāne
ps1.4:55.6_0: catūsu sammappadhānesu vīriyindriyassa vasena imehi vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ cariyā daṭṭhabbā.
ps1.4:56.1_0: Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu satindriyassa vasena katamehi vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ cariyā daṭṭhabbā?
ps1.4:56.2_0: Kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhāne upaṭṭhānādhipateyyaṭṭhena satindriyassa cariyā daṭṭhabbā,
ps1.4:56.2_1: satindriyassa vasena avikkhepaṭṭhena samādhindriyassa cariyā daṭṭhabbā,
ps1.4:56.5_0: dhammesu dhammānupassanāsatipaṭṭhāne upaṭṭhānādhipateyyaṭṭhena satindriyassa cariyā daṭṭhabbā …pe…
ps1.4:56.6_0: catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu satindriyassa vasena imehi vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ cariyā daṭṭhabbā.
ps1.4:57.1_0: Catūsu jhānesu samādhindriyassa vasena katamehi vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ cariyā daṭṭhabbā?
ps1.4:57.2_0: Paṭhame jhāne avikkhepādhipateyyaṭṭhena samādhindriyassa cariyā daṭṭhabbā,
ps1.4:57.2_1: samādhindriyassa vasena dassanaṭṭhena paññindriyassa cariyā daṭṭhabbā,
ps1.4:57.5_0: catutthe jhāne avikkhepādhipateyyaṭṭhena samādhindriyassa cariyā daṭṭhabbā …pe…
ps1.4:57.6_0: catūsu jhānesu samādhindriyassa vasena imehi vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ cariyā daṭṭhabbā.
ps1.4:58.1_0: Catūsu ariyasaccesu paññindriyassa vasena katamehi vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ cariyā daṭṭhabbā?
ps1.4:58.2_0: Dukkhe ariyasacce dassanādhipateyyaṭṭhena paññindriyassa cariyā daṭṭhabbā,
ps1.4:58.2_1: paññindriyassa vasena adhimokkhaṭṭhena saddhindriyassa cariyā daṭṭhabbā,
ps1.4:58.5_0: dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ariyasacce dassanādhipateyyaṭṭhena paññindriyassa cariyā daṭṭhabbā,
ps1.4:58.5_1: paññindriyassa vasena adhimokkhaṭṭhena saddhindriyassa cariyā daṭṭhabbā,
ps1.4:58.6_0: Catūsu ariyasaccesu paññindriyassa vasena imehi vīsatiyā ākārehi pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ cariyā daṭṭhabbā.
ps1.4:59.1_0: Cāro ca vihāro ca anubuddho hoti paṭividdho,
ps1.4:59.1_1: yathācarantaṁ yathāviharantaṁ viññū sabrahmacārī gambhīresu ṭhānesu okappeyyuṁ—
ps1.4:61.2_6: evaṁ paṭipannassa kusalā dhammā āyāpentīti āyatanacariyāya carati,
ps1.4:65.6_0: Gambhīresu ṭhānesūti gambhīrāni ṭhānāni vuccanti jhānā ca vimokkhā ca samādhī ca samāpattiyo ca
ps1.4:65.6_1: maggā ca phalāni ca abhiññāyo ca paṭisambhidā ca.
ps1.4:68.1_0: Kāmacchandaṁ pajahato nekkhammavasena adhimokkhādhipateyyaṭṭhena saddhindriyaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ,
ps1.4:68.2_0: Kāmacchandaṁ pajahato nekkhammavasena paggahādhipateyyaṭṭhena vīriyindriyaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ,
ps1.4:68.3_0: Kāmacchandaṁ pajahato nekkhammavasena upaṭṭhānādhipateyyaṭṭhena satindriyaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ,
ps1.4:68.4_0: Kāmacchandaṁ pajahato nekkhammavasena avikkhepādhipateyyaṭṭhena samādhindriyaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ,
ps1.4:68.5_0: Kāmacchandaṁ pajahato nekkhammavasena dassanādhipateyyaṭṭhena paññindriyaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ,
ps1.4:69.3_0: sabbakilese pajahato arahattamaggavasena adhimokkhādhipateyyaṭṭhena saddhindriyaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ,
ps1.4:69.4_0: sabbakilese pajahato arahattamaggavasena dassanādhipateyyaṭṭhena paññindriyaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ,
ps1.4:71.25_0: ekarasaṭṭhena bhāvanāvasena saddhāvasena saddhindriyaṁ adhimattaṁ hoti.
ps1.4:73.18_0: uddhaccassa pahānāya chando uppajjati uddhaccapariḷāhassa pahānāya chando uppajjati …pe…
ps1.4:76.2_0: Adhimokkhaṭṭhena saddhindriyaṁ assaddhiyaṁ pariyādiyati, assaddhiyapariḷāhaṁ pariyādiyati.
ps1.4:76.3_0: Paggahaṭṭhena vīriyindriyaṁ kosajjaṁ pariyādiyati, kosajjapariḷāhaṁ pariyādiyati.
ps1.4:76.4_0: Upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena satindriyaṁ pamādaṁ pariyādiyati, pamādapariḷāhaṁ pariyādiyati.
ps1.4:76.5_0: Avikkhepaṭṭhena samādhindriyaṁ uddhaccaṁ pariyādiyati, uddhaccapariḷāhaṁ pariyādiyati.
ps1.4:76.6_0: Dassanaṭṭhena paññindriyaṁ avijjaṁ pariyādiyati, avijjāpariḷāhaṁ pariyādiyati.
ps1.4:77.2_0: Saddho saddhindriyaṁ adhimokkhe patiṭṭhāpeti, saddhassa saddhindriyaṁ adhimokkhe patiṭṭhāpeti.
ps1.4:77.3_0: Vīriyavā vīriyindriyaṁ paggahe patiṭṭhāpeti, vīriyavato vīriyindriyaṁ paggahe patiṭṭhāpeti.
ps1.4:77.4_0: Satimā satindriyaṁ upaṭṭhāne patiṭṭhāpeti, satimato satindriyaṁ upaṭṭhāne patiṭṭhāpeti.
ps1.4:77.5_0: Samāhito samādhindriyaṁ avikkhepe patiṭṭhāpeti, samāhitassa samādhindriyaṁ avikkhepe patiṭṭhāpeti.
ps1.4:77.6_0: Paññavā paññindriyaṁ dassane patiṭṭhāpeti, paññavato paññindriyaṁ dassane patiṭṭhāpeti.
ps1.4:77.8_0: Yogāvacaro pañcindriyāni abyāpāde patiṭṭhāpeti, yogāvacarassa pañcindriyāni abyāpāde patiṭṭhāpenti.
ps1.4:78.1_0: Puthujjano samādhiṁ bhāvento katihākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti?
ps1.4:78.2_0: Sekkho samādhiṁ bhāvento katihākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti?
ps1.4:78.3_0: Vītarāgo samādhiṁ bhāvento katihākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti?
ps1.4:78.4_0: Puthujjano samādhiṁ bhāvento sattahi ākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti.
ps1.4:78.5_0: Sekkho samādhiṁ bhāvento aṭṭhahi ākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti.
ps1.4:78.6_0: Vītarāgo samādhiṁ bhāvento dasahi ākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti.
ps1.4:79.1_0: Puthujjano samādhiṁ bhāvento katamehi sattahi ākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti?
ps1.4:79.3_0: puthujjano samādhiṁ bhāvento imehi sattahi ākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti.
ps1.4:80.1_0: Sekkho samādhiṁ bhāvento katamehi aṭṭhahi ākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti?
ps1.4:80.3_0: sekkho samādhiṁ bhāvento imehi aṭṭhahi ākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti.
ps1.4:81.1_0: Vītarāgo samādhiṁ bhāvento katamehi dasahi ākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti?
ps1.4:81.3_0: vītarāgo samādhiṁ bhāvento imehi dasahi ākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti.
ps1.4:82.1_0: Puthujjano vipassanaṁ bhāvento katihākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti,
ps1.4:82.2_0: Sekkho vipassanaṁ bhāvento katihākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti, katihākārehi anupaṭṭhānakusalo hoti?
ps1.4:82.3_0: Vītarāgo vipassanaṁ bhāvento katihākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti, katihākārehi anupaṭṭhānakusalo hoti?
ps1.4:83.1_0: Puthujjano vipassanaṁ bhāvento navahi ākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti,
ps1.4:83.2_0: Sekkho vipassanaṁ bhāvento dasahi ākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti,
ps1.4:83.3_0: Vītarāgo vipassanaṁ bhāvento dvādasahi ākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti,
ps1.4:84.1_0: Puthujjano vipassanaṁ bhāvento katamehi navahi ākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti,
ps1.4:84.2_0: Aniccato upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti, niccato anupaṭṭhānakusalo hoti.
ps1.4:84.3_0: Dukkhato upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti, sukhato anupaṭṭhānakusalo hoti.
ps1.4:84.4_0: Anattato upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti, attato anupaṭṭhānakusalo hoti.
ps1.4:84.5_0: Khayato upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti, ghanato anupaṭṭhānakusalo hoti.
ps1.4:84.11_0: puthujjano vipassanaṁ bhāvento imehi navahi ākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti,
ps1.4:85.1_0: Sekkho vipassanaṁ bhāvento katamehi dasahi ākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti,
ps1.4:85.4_0: sekkho vipassanaṁ bhāvento imehi dasahi ākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti,
ps1.4:86.1_0: Vītarāgo vipassanaṁ bhāvento katamehi dvādasahi ākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti,
ps1.4:86.5_0: vītarāgo vipassanaṁ bhāvento imehi dvādasahi ākārehi upaṭṭhānakusalo hoti,
ps1.4:87.2_0: dhamme samodhāneti, gocarañca pajānāti, samatthañca paṭivijjhati.
ps1.4:89.1_0: Catusaṭṭhiyā ākārehi tiṇṇannaṁ indriyānaṁ vasibhāvatā paññā āsavānaṁ khaye ñāṇaṁ.
ps1.4:90.7_0: sotāpattiphalaṁ, sakadāgāmimaggaṁ, sakadāgāmiphalaṁ, anāgāmimaggaṁ, anāgāmiphalaṁ, arahattamaggaṁ.
ps1.4:91.3_0: Sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe anaññātaññassāmītindriyassa imāni aṭṭhindriyāni sahajātaparivārā honti,
ps1.4:91.4_0: Teva tassa ākārā ceva honti parivārā ca.
ps1.4:92.4_0: Arahattaphalakkhaṇe jātā dhammā sabbeva abyākatā honti,
ps1.4:92.4_1: ṭhapetvā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ sabbeva anāsavā honti,
ps1.4:92.5_0: Arahattaphalakkhaṇe aññātāvindriyassa imāni aṭṭhindriyāni sahajātaparivārā honti.
ps1.4:92.6_0: Teva tassa ākārā ceva honti parivārā ca.
ps1.4:92.7_0: Iti imāni aṭṭha aṭṭhakāni catusaṭṭhi honti.
ps1.4:93.5_0: Apāyagamanīyo kāmāsavo khīyati, apāyagamanīyo bhavāsavo khīyati, apāyagamanīyo avijjāsavo khīyati.
ps1.4:93.11_0: Arahattamaggena anavaseso bhavāsavo khīyati, anavaseso avijjāsavo khīyati.
ps1.4:95.3_0: dukkhe ñāṇaṁ buddhañāṇaṁ, dukkhasamudaye ñāṇaṁ buddhañāṇaṁ …pe…
ps1.4:95.6_0: Imesaṁ cuddasannaṁ buddhañāṇānaṁ aṭṭha ñāṇāni sāvakasādhāraṇāni, cha ñāṇāni asādhāraṇāni sāvakehi.
ps1.4:96.1_0: Yāvatā dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭho ñāto, aññāto dukkhaṭṭho natthīti—
ps1.4:96.5_0: Yāvatā dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭho diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya;
ps1.4:96.21_0: yāvatā sadevakassa lokassa samārakassa sabrahmakassa sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya diṭṭhaṁ
ps1.4:96.21_1: sutaṁ mutaṁ viññātaṁ pattaṁ pariyesitaṁ anuvicaritaṁ manasā,
ps1.4:96.21_2: taṁ ñātaṁ diṭṭhaṁ viditaṁ sacchikataṁ phassitaṁ paññāya.
ps1.4:99.1_2: yena cakkhunā tathāgato satte passati apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svākāre dvākāre
ps1.4:100.1_0: Apparajakkhe mahārajakkheti saddho puggalo apparajakkho, assaddho puggalo mahārajakkho.
ps1.4:100.2_0: Āraddhavīriyo puggalo apparajakkho, kusīto puggalo mahārajakkho.
ps1.4:100.3_0: Upaṭṭhitassati puggalo apparajakkho, muṭṭhassati puggalo mahārajakkho.
ps1.4:100.4_0: Samāhito puggalo apparajakkho, asamāhito puggalo mahārajakkho.
ps1.4:100.5_0: Paññavā puggalo apparajakkho, duppañño puggalo mahārajakkho.
ps1.4:101.1_0: Tikkhindriye mudindriyeti saddho puggalo tikkhindriyo, assaddho puggalo mudindriyo …pe…
ps1.4:101.2_0: paññavā puggalo tikkhindriyo, duppañño puggalo mudindriyo.
ps1.4:101.3_0: Svākāre dvākāreti saddho puggalo svākāro, assaddho puggalo dvākāro …pe…
ps1.4:101.4_0: paññavā puggalo svākāro, duppañño puggalo dvākāro.
ps1.4:101.5_0: Suviññāpaye duviññāpayeti saddho puggalo suviññāpayo, assaddho puggalo duviññāpayo …pe…
ps1.4:101.6_0: paññavā puggalo suviññāpayo, duppañño puggalo duviññāpayo.
ps1.4:102.2_0: Āraddhavīriyo puggalo paralokavajjabhayadassāvī, kusīto puggalo naparalokavajjabhayadassāvī …pe…
ps1.4:102.3_0: paññavā puggalo paralokavajjabhayadassāvī, duppañño puggalo naparalokavajjabhayadassāvī.
ps1.4:103.1_0: Lokoti khandhaloko dhātuloko āyatanaloko vipattibhavaloko vipattisambhavaloko sampattibhavaloko sampattisambhavaloko.
ps1.4:105.2_0: Iti imasmiñca loke imasmiñca vajje tibbā bhayasaññā paccupaṭṭhitā honti,
ps1.4:105.3_0: Imehi paññāsāya ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni jānāti passati aññāti paṭivijjhatīti.
